oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Multiple Lerch zeta functions and an idea of Ramanujan
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gun, Sanoli
Saha, Biswajyoti
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Number Theory
11M32, 11M35, 32Dxx
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this article, we derive meromorphic continuation of multiple Lerch zeta functions by generalising an elegant identity of Ramanujan. Further, we describe the set of all possible singularities of these functions. Finally, for the multiple Hurwitz zeta functions, we list the exact set of singularities.
